title.narrative: Pakistan: Punjab Public Management Reform Program

description.narrative: To improve transparency and resource management of targeted departments of the Province of Punjab.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PK-53140 | Description :Pakistan shall cause Punjab to, and Punjab shall, engage an independent third partyentity or entities within the specified time period to undertake the verification process. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PK-53140 | Description :Pakistan shall cause Punjab to, and Punjab shall, furnish to the Bank verificationreports by not later than 60 days after the end of the period covered by each report. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PK-53140 | Description :Pakistan shall cause Punjab to, and Punjab shall, undertake a verification process toverify the DLRs at least annually. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PK-53140 | Description :Pakistan shall ensure that the Program Action Plan is carried out in a mannersatisfactory to the Bank, and Punjab shall carry out the Program Action Plan in a manner satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency:Continuous

title.narrative: Services accepting mobile applications and/or payments
Decision-makers using reliable service delivery information for improved management measured as the percentage of reports that trigger managerial action
Targeted contracts processed through basic e-procurement modules in targeted organizations.
District services for which proactive citizen feedback is collected
Targeted organizations using PPRA MIS for targeted contracts
District services for which performance information and citizen feedback is published online
Districts with functional digital property registry
Functional facilitation centers - using PPP model
Public investment projects of targeted departments geo-mapped and published online.
Targeted departments with automated records system for defined disclosable information.
Targeted organizations publishing updated institutional information on their websites for information of the public.
District services being monitored by smart management tools
Information about key services available to the public through the Contact Center.
Properties added to the property registry
Urban immoveable property tax collection (in PKRs Million)
Number of enquiries/comments received by Citizen Contact Center to seek information about, or to provide feedback on key services
